T02D3783:223a-0: @223a * // bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs//
T02D3783:223a-2: # // dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D3783:223a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D3783:223a-4: lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su
T02D3783:223a-5: bcad pa / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D3783:223a-6: / bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa //
T02D3783:223a-7: rin chen 'byung ldan 'dod pa med dang don yod grub //
T02D3783:223a-8: rigs lnga bde gshegs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223a-9: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223a-10: shog / rdo rje sems ma dang ni rin chen
T02D3783:223a-11: sems ma dang // chos kyi sems ma dang ni las kyi sems mar bcas //
T02D3783:223a-12: bcom ldan yum mchog rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223a-13: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223a-14: shog / rdo rje sems dpa' dang ni rdo rje
T02D3783:223a-15: rgyal po dang // rdo rje chags pa dang ni rdo rje legs par bcas //
T02D3783:223a-16: bcom ldan mi bskyod 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223a-17: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223a-18: shog / rdo rje chen dang ni rdo rje gzi
T02D3783:223a-19: brjid dang // rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang ni rdo rje bzhad par bcas //
T02D3783:223b-0: bcom ldan rin 'byung 'khor @223b gyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223b-1: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223b-2: shog / rdo rje chos rab dang ni rdo rje
T02D3783:223b-3: rnon po dang // rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje sma bar bcas //
T02D3783:223b-4: bcom ldan snang mtha'i 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223b-5: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223b-6: shog / rdo rje las rab dang ni rdo rje
T02D3783:223b-7: srung ba dang // rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ni rdo rje khu tshur bcas //
T02D3783:223b-8: bcom ldan don grub 'khor gyi bkra shis gong yod pa //
T02D3783:223b-9: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223b-10: shog / lha mo sgeg mo dang ni lha mo
T02D3783:223b-11: phreng ba ma // lha mo glu ma dang ni lha mo gar mar bcas //
T02D3783:223b-12: nang gi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223b-13: bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223b-14: shog / lha mo bdug spos ma dang lha mo
T02D3783:223b-15: me tog ma // lha mo mar me ma dang lha mo dri mar bcas //
T02D3783:223b-16: phyi yi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223b-17: bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223b-18: shog / sgo ba lcags kyu dang ni sgo ba
T02D3783:223b-19: zhags pa dang // sgo ba lcags sgrog dang ni sgo ba dril bur bcas //
T02D3783:223b-20: bcom ldan sgo srung rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa //
T02D3783:223b-21: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis
T02D3783:223b-22: shog / dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D3783:223b-23: gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang
T02D3783:223b-24: bcas pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis
